com.michaelRunzler.ARK.android.util.Settings

Class SettingsManagerDelegator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.michaelRunzler.ARK.android.util.Settings.SettingsManagerDelegator

  • public class SettingsManagerDelegator
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages cross-class instancing of the SettingsManager object for cases where multiple classes must share an instance of said object. Also manages a multi-object dynamic instance index, for multiple concurrent global instances.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SettingsManagerDelegator()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static SettingsManager getDynamicInstance(short ID)
      Generates a new dynamic SettingsManager instance with the specified ID, or gets an existing one if one exists.
      static SettingsManager getMainInstance()
      Gets the available SettingsManager global instance.
      static SettingsManager refreshMainInstance()
      Voids the current global SettingsManager instance and creates a new one.
      static void setDynamicInstance(short ID, SettingsManager newInstance)
      Sets the specified ID in the dynamic instance index to the provided SettingsManager.
      static void setMainInstance(SettingsManager newInstance)
      Sets the current global instance to the specified object.

    • Method Detail

      • getMainInstance

        public static SettingsManager getMainInstance()
        Gets the available SettingsManager global instance.
        Returns:
        the current global SettingsManager instance

      • refreshMainInstance

        public static SettingsManager refreshMainInstance()
        Voids the current global SettingsManager instance and creates a new one.
        Returns:
        the new global instance

      • setMainInstance

        public static void setMainInstance(@NonNull
                                   SettingsManager newInstance)
        Sets the current global instance to the specified object.
        Parameters:
        newInstance - the SettingsManager object to set the global reference to

      • getDynamicInstance

        public static SettingsManager getDynamicInstance(short ID)
        Generates a new dynamic SettingsManager instance with the specified ID, or gets an existing one if one exists.
        Parameters:
        ID - the ID of the desired SettingsManager global instance to get or create
        Returns:
        the SettingsManager global instance at the specified ID, or a new instance if none existed

      • setDynamicInstance

        public static void setDynamicInstance(short ID,
                                      SettingsManager newInstance)
        Sets the specified ID in the dynamic instance index to the provided SettingsManager.
        Parameters:
        ID - the ID of the desired SettingsManager global instance to replace
        newInstance - the SettingsManager object to replace the desired ID with
